name: Burly Fishing
description:
Meditative game about fisherman, the sea, fishes, starvation and the Storm of Doom.

Fish on the sea, return to the island for feeding your family or for upgrades.

Buy tickets to Canada to win.

CONTROLS

Move the boat - alternately (SPAM!) pressing left and right arrow

Start fishing/ Accept dialog / Enter island - press Space

Stop Fishing /Decline Dialog/ Exit island - press F

Patch 1.33.7

Game is more or less playable now... fixed 13 of 349234 bugs!
